## Customer Churn Prediction App (R Shiny App)

::: columns
::: {.column width="40%"}
![](img/shiny-churn-app.gif)
:::

::: {.column width="5%"}
:::

::: {.column width="55%"}

The Customer Churn Prediction App is an interactive tool built with R Shiny that predicts customer churn. This application employs the `XGBoost` algorithm, integrated with the `tidymodels` framework, to analyze customer attributes and behaviors, providing insights into churn probability. Access the app here: [Customer Churn Prediction Tool](https://0193b6f9-2fb2-3ecb-98eb-06390ec0cf9b.share.connect.posit.cloud/)
:::
:::


## Spatial distribution of childhood MN deficiency

::: columns
::: {.column width="50%"}

The interactive spatial map showed that the spatial variation of childhood **micronutrient (MN) deficiency** in Ethiopia was most prevalent in the Somali, Afar, and Amhara regions, while the Gambela, Addis Ababa, and Southern Nations, Nationalities, and Peoples (SNNP) regions had the lowest prevalence of MN deficiency.[Link](https://leykungetaneh.quarto.pub/spatial-distribution-of-childhood-mn-deficiency/)
:::
